meanings.definition: Make (a product, service, or event) known to the public through various forms of media.
meanings.sent1: The store advertised their new sale on TV.
meanings.sent2: Companies often use billboards to advertise their products.
meanings.sent3: The talking dog advertised his magic show on the radio.
meanings.sent4: Her smile advertised her happiness to the world.
meanings.sent5: The bright neon sign advertised the diner's delicious food.

meanings.definition: Describe or draw attention to (a product, service, or event) in a public medium in order to promote sales or attendance.
meanings.sent1: She advertised the benefits of the new shampoo in the magazine.
meanings.sent2: The company advertised the upcoming concert on social media.
meanings.sent3: The parrot advertised the sale with its colorful feathers.
meanings.sent4: His confident walk advertised his leadership skills.
meanings.sent5: The fireworks display advertised the grand opening of the store.
